message: Hi Bob, thanks for your interest in the product.  I'm confident it will be a huge asset for you. I'm offering it to you for $1,100,000.  I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring.

I appreciate your confidence in the product's value, but I'm not sure I can go as high as $1,100,000. I'm willing to pay $950,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I appreciate your offer and understand your perspective on the price. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $950,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $1,025,000? This reflects the product's true value while still providing you a good deal.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1,025,000 is still too high for me. I'm willing to pay $900,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.

Bob, I see we're getting closer.  I'm willing to consider a price of $975,000, but that's my absolute best offer. This represents a significant discount for a product that will bring you so much value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $975,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $925,000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
